Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Provides for the use of public campsites, parks and other public places of recreation in the state by individuals with a mental disability free of charge
Summary: Allows for individuals with a mental disability who receive or are eligible to receive services for such disability to use any of the public campsites, parks and other public places of recreation in the state without the payment of any fees or other charges.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing for individuals with a mental disability to use any of the public campsites, parks and other public places of recreation in the state without the payment of any fees or other charges
